籤詩版本二:
Njengedada elibhabha lisuka ehokweni, ndifuna ukufumana omnye umzimba kodwa andikwazi
Kunzima ukuphuma emantla, emazantsi, empuma nasentshona.Le hexagram yoyika ngokwenene inzondo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nedada eliziphosa emanzini (ekhejini).
Yonke into ayinanto kwaye ayinanyani.
解曰: Akunakwenzeka (akunakwenzeka) ukungena emzimbeni. Ukuhlehla kuku (ku) ukwazi. Gcina intloko yakho phantsi kwaye uye ngqo. Konke kuyo.
籤詩故事一:
◇UQin woyisa waza wathimba abathetheli abathathu
UDuke Mu waseQin akazange aliphulaphule icebiso lomphathiswa wakhe ongumakhwekhwetha uJian Gong waza wathumela amajoni ukuba aye kuhlasela ilizwe laseZheng, walwa nabantu baseJin eHuo (ephakathi kweLuoning County neShaanxian County kwiPhondo laseHenan, eTshayina).
Umkhosi wamaJin wawurhwebesha umkhosi wamaQin kwintlambo eyingozi, indlela engaphambili yayivaliwe.Amajoni amaJin macala omabini agibisela umlilo, isulfure, nesalfa, amaJin awayesemva kwawo abulala ngengxolo enkulu. kubangele inkitha yabantu abaninzi.
Zoyisiwe zaza zabanjwa zontathu iinjengele.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, uvaleleke, ukhangela imali, isigebenga, ukurhweba, ukuchitha umtshato, ukwenzakala kolwaphulo-mthetho, iLiujia, isohlwayo, ukuphanga, ukuthintela abahambi ngeenyawo, ukungabikho kwemibungu yesilika, isibetho semfuyo emithandathu, abantu abalahlekileyo, amatyala, ilishwa, ukufuduka, ukulahleka okungathandekiyo. impahla, izifo ezimandundu, iintaba ezisasazayo namangcwaba
古人: UQin woyisa waza wabamba abalawuli abathathu
